name: When Team3 Gets Bored
storyline:
Well.
Everything wrapped up really nicely for Sonic and co., didn't it?
Sonic can relax.
Tails isn't bored.
Knux found his shoe.
Amy even got into SA2.
All's well that ends well, ne?
...Well, obviously not, because otherwise we wouldn't have a game now.
One group is not happy with the outcome of When Tails Gets Bored, and that's Tails' three most senior clones, Team3.
Now, they're out for just a little bit of revenge, and it's your job (along with some help from me, the game's designer) to help them...
